name: Puyo Puyo 15th Anniversary
description:
Puyo Puyo 15th Anniversary is a puzzle game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Puyo Puyo 15th Anniversary is available on Nintendo DS, PSP and Wii.
It was produced by Akinori Nishiyama. Mizuki Hosoyamada directed the game. Hideki Abe scored the game.
